translations: v．赎罪，弥补（expiate 的第三人称单数）：为了消除罪过、错误或不幸的后果而采取行动。

sentences.sentence: The paper introduces several utilization ways of coke-oven gas and emphatically expiates the application of heat-power coordinated supply technology of gas turbine at Yangquhe Coking Plant.
sentences.translation: 本文介绍几种焦炉煤气的利用途径，重点阐述了燃气轮机热电联供技术在羊渠河焦化厂的应用。
